mapper.select: SELECT A.SIGN_DETAIL_NM AS signDetailNm , B.USER_NAME AS signDetailUserNm , A.SIGN_DETAIL_USER_ID AS signDetailUserId , A.SIGN_EMP_CD AS signEmpCd , C.USER_NAME AS signEmpNm , A.SIGN_TIME AS signTime , A.SIGN_IMAGE AS signImage FROM SIGN_RECORD A INNER JOIN USER_INFO B ON B.USER_ID = A.SIGN_DETAIL_USER_ID LEFT JOIN USER_INFO C ON B.USER_ID = A.SIGN_EMP_CD WHERE SIGN_ID = @SIGN_ID AND SIGN_CD = @SIGN_CD
